entry.def: Sealskin is the fur of a seal, used to make coats and other clothing.

means.word_mean: 1. the pelt or fur (especially the underfur) of a seal;
2. a garment (as a jacket or coat or robe) made of sealskin

auth_sentence.content: Built using driftwood, sealskin and slate, the glass ceiling allows perfect views of the northern lights.
